Name: Lily
Description: The white variety of this flower is often used in ceremonies.

DescriptionLocalization.es: Una planta grande y tupida que produce flores de olor dulce.
DescriptionLocalization.ko: 하얀 백합은 종종 의식에 사용되기도 합니다.
DescriptionLocalization.de: Die weiße Sorte dieser Blume wird häufig in Zeremonien verwendet.
DescriptionLocalization.pt: A variedade branca desta flor é freqüentemente usada em cerimônias.
DescriptionLocalization.ru: Белый сорт этого цветка часто используется в церемониях.
DescriptionLocalization.zh: 这种花的白色品种经常在各种仪式和典礼中使用。
